name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance – Festival Suite
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8699-OASD-1871">Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


New DLC Available

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1052530/Kingdom_Come_Deliverance__OST_Atmospheres__Additionals/


About the Video

Experience the award-winning music of Kingdom Come: Deliverance performed live during SOUNDTRACK festival in Poděbrady, Czech Republic.

The historical RPG taking place in Bohemia in turbulent times after the death of Charles IV. boasts not only a sophisticated story, historical precision and great graphic concept, but also an unusually sophisticated orchestral soundtrack by the Czech composer Jan Valta, interlaced with medieval songs by Adam Sporka. Both artists performed live on the stage, Jan Valta as conductor of the Hradec Králové Philharmonic Orchestra.

You have the chance to enjoy the soundtrack live along with video scenes from the game and thus experience the story of Henry, the main character, over again.

  • 1:20 Skalitz 1403
  • 9:40 Feasts of Rattay
  • 11:30 Talmberg
  • 19:35 Fist Fight
  • 22:32 Return to Skalitz
  • 30:38 Till Our Heads Turn White
  • 32:07 Landscapes
  • 39:10 Beer and Women
  • 41:34 Undercover & Battle of Pribyslawitz
  • 50:27 Sasau
  • 55:55 Poverty and Famine
  • 57:40 Battle of Talmberg
  • 1:04:51 Things Worth Living for
  • 1:15:08 Encore: People of the Land

Thanks to SOUNDTRACK Poděbrady festival for production of the concert and the video!

short_description: Experience the award-winning music of Kingdom Come: Deliverance performed live during SOUNDTRACK festival in Poděbrady. You have the chance to enjoy the soundtrack live along with video scenes from the game and thus experience the story of Henry, the main character, over again.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
